name: Ritchie Tiongson
text: Yuz. Easy way to get additional income. Make a great product that can last years. Make that product use a component (charger and cables) that can also last years. Construct said component with one part (thin, easily worn out rubber insulation) that isn't integral to the functioning of said component, but when damaged easily convinces consumer to buy a whole new component.
